description:
We begin the day with Casey in our dental chair that has been modified to suit our needs. She is completely helpless, so the torment begins immediately. She is flogged to turn her milky white skin a nice shade of red. Her head is incased and bound to the chair to further immobilize her. Pegs are applied and all of them are attached to a mechanism that will snatch them all at once at the precise time.
Next we have Casey in a brutal hogtie that has this slut totally helpless. Her body can't take it, and her mind wants to give up. She fights to hold on, but in the end the device wins this battle and we have to release her and move on to her next trial.
In the final scene we introduce a brand new device. This is is the current manipulation of our vampire trap and it seems to be doing it's job well. Casey is totally fucked and can't move any part of her body without inflicting pain on herself. To make things worse, The Pope taps on the stakes to put even more pressure on the already painful predicament.
title: Into the Darkness
